alert.note: Alert for Rock (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 4:51PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy rain will impact portions of Rock County through 530 PM CDT... At 447 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms along a line extending from Evansville to near Durand. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall lasting for 5 to 10 minutes. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hydroplaning for vehicles that do not slow down. Visibility less than one mile. Locations impacted include... Janesville, Milton, Edgerton, Evansville, Orfordville, Footville, Fulton, Newark, Magnolia, Hanover, Avalon, Cooksville, Afton, Emerald Grove, Johnstown Center, Indianford, Leyden and Lima Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Slow down to avoid hydroplaning.
